name: Shenzhen Idreamsky Technology
overview:
iDreamSky has released several iOS and Android games. Now It is currently developing a new Android China focus mobile social gaming platform design specifically for skill base oriented games called SkyNet.

SkyNet is pretty similar to Game Center in iOS and Xbox Live Arcade of Xbox. This platform is primary design for the China Android devices. SkyNet will be the official game center (pre-loaded) for the following manufacturers’ Android devices such as Lenovo, China Telecom, Oppo, TCL, Coolpad, Gionee.

SkyNet includes popular and common services such as achievement, leaderboard, ranks and levels. With an additional focus on player versus player tournaments, also integrated popular China focus social media service such as Sina’s Weibo (China’s Twitter), Ren Ren (China’s Facebook), Tencent QQ and many other popular service in China.

SkyNet also has integrated payment solutions which support micro-transaction, subscription mechanism, and only platform in China that could clear transaction with Alibabae’s Alipay, eBanking, pre-pay card and many other China online payment/credit system .

offices.address1: Rm.811, CASTD Building, South Gao Xin RD 1, Nan Shan, Shenzhen 518057, China.
